title: Drawing, "Ulysses Escapes the Cyclops’s Cave and Embarks with a Companion"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed inside tondo: 4 vediamo l'istesso Polifemo tra le greggie moversi coll'immenso suo corpo.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ulysses Escapes the Cyclops’s Cave and Embarks with a Companion".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2224.
